00012 void b3ComputeWorldAabb(  int bodyId, __global const b3RigidBodyData_t* bodies, __global const  b3Collidable_t* collidables, __global const  b3Aabb_t* localShapeAABB, __global b3Aabb_t* worldAabbs)
00013 {
00014         __global const b3RigidBodyData_t* body = &bodies[bodyId];
00015 
00016         b3Float4 position = body->m_pos;
00017         b3Quat  orientation = body->m_quat;
00018         
00019         int collidableIndex = body->m_collidableIdx;
00020         int shapeIndex = collidables[collidableIndex].m_shapeIndex;
00021                 
00022         if (shapeIndex>=0)
00023         {
00024                                 
00025                 b3Aabb_t localAabb = localShapeAABB[collidableIndex];
00026                 b3Aabb_t worldAabb;
00027                 
00028                 b3Float4 aabbAMinOut,aabbAMaxOut;       
00029                 float margin = 0.f;
00030                 b3TransformAabb2(localAabb.m_minVec,localAabb.m_maxVec,margin,position,orientation,&aabbAMinOut,&aabbAMaxOut);
00031                 
00032                 worldAabb.m_minVec =aabbAMinOut;
00033                 worldAabb.m_minIndices[3] = bodyId;
00034                 worldAabb.m_maxVec = aabbAMaxOut;
00035                 worldAabb.m_signedMaxIndices[3] = body[bodyId].m_invMass==0.f? 0 : 1;
00036                 worldAabbs[bodyId] = worldAabb;
00037         }
00038 }
00039 
00040 #endif //B3_UPDATE_AABBS_H
